ability.Tailwind: On switch-in, this Pokemon sets up Tailwind, which increases its Speed for 3 turns.

Dragon Rush.effect: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch. User receives recoil damage equal to 1/3 its max HP.

Fly.effect: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks.
